flawed_nl_solution:
The pages she has left to read by Thursday are P + 2P = 3P = 158 - 23 - 38 - 61 = 33 pages.
Therefore, to finish the book on Friday, Cora has to read P = 33 / 3 = <<33/3=11>>11 pages on Thursday.
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 33. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
